xworker.html.extjs.Items/@Button
@xworker.app.view.extjs.widgets.grid.GridTextAreaEditor/@textarea/@view/@ExtJs/@Window/@buttons/@Button/@handler
sname
handler
Scode
#$@text#$@
var win = Ext.getCmp('grid_textared_editor_win');
if(win.parentField){
    var textarea = Ext.getCmp('grid_textared_editor_win_text');
    win.parentField.setRawValue(textarea.getValue());
}
win.hide();
#$@text#$@
shaveTypeInCode
false
svarglobal
false
sdescriptors
